snippet.title: Castle of Asleep (English Version)
snippet.description:
https://millchan.booth.pm/items/4294099

One-way non-field RPG.
Released in Japan in 2015.
Proceed while defeating enemies that appear in your path, picking up items, and investigating,
Reach the sleeping castle in less than 3 minutes.

---story---
Tonight too
I…that dark,deep,depressed,that road...
I have to go...

---feature---
-All hand-drawn picture, text, and UI design.
-Original cute BGM.
-Cute and mystical monochrome world.
-An ultra-short RPG where the goal is to reach within 3 minutes.

---About review, fan art, game commentary, and live broadcastse---
All welcome.

*Secondary use, sale and redistribution of any material taken from this game is prohibited.
*Unauthorized reproduction of this game in part or whole and unauthorized commercial use are prohibited.

※2015年に公開した『夢のお城』の英語版になります。日本語販はミルチァンゲームスのゲーム一覧にございます。
